thread.title: Great choice in London -
thread.title_full: Great choice in London - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Torresluci
title: Great choice in London -
text:
The hotel is very simple yet modern and practical. The front desk staff was very polite; they even helped us book a taxi for our return which was in the early hours.
The location is very good being right next to Paddington station (Heathrow Express, which is well worth it) and the Edgware tube station.
The hotel room is small but comfortable, and it has what it takes for a good stay. The cleaning is done every three days which did not bother us at all.
Next to the hotel there are several cafes and restaurants, including a 24h supermarket just across the street.
I highly recommend the hotel, and will definitely stay at it on my next visit to London.
Room Tip: Ask for a hotel on the higher floors, it has a slight noise from the tube. See more room tips
